trans-unit.source: Indicates that a method will allow a variable number of arguments in its invocation.
trans-unit.target: 表示方法將允許在引動過程中使用不定數目的引數。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ParamArrayAttribute> indicates that a method parameter is a parameter array.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ParamArrayAttribute>表示方法參數的參數陣列。

trans-unit.source: A parameter array allows the specification of an unknown number of arguments.
trans-unit.target: 參數陣列允許未知的引數數目的規格。

trans-unit.source: A parameter array must be the last parameter in a formal parameter list, and it must be a single-dimension array.
trans-unit.target: 參數陣列必須是在型式參數清單中，最後一個參數，而且它必須是單一維度陣列。

trans-unit.source: When the method is called, a parameter array permits arguments to a method to be specified in either of two ways:
trans-unit.target: 呼叫此方法時，參數陣列會允許兩種方式中，指定方法的引數：

trans-unit.source: As a single expression of a type that is implicitly convertible to the parameter array type.
trans-unit.target: 為隱含轉換為參數陣列型別之型別的單一運算式。

trans-unit.source: The parameter array functions as a value parameter.
trans-unit.target: 參數陣列做為值參數。

trans-unit.source: As zero or more arguments, where each argument is an expression of a type that is implictly convertible to the type of the parameter array element.
trans-unit.target: 以零個或多個引數，其中每個引數是型別是可隱含轉換的參數陣列項目類型的運算式。

trans-unit.source: The example in the next section illustrates both calling conventions.
trans-unit.target: 下一節中的範例將說明這兩個呼叫慣例。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the <xref:System.ParamArrayAttribute> is not used directly in code.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，<xref:System.ParamArrayAttribute>不是直接在程式碼中。

trans-unit.source: Instead, individual language keywords, such as `ParamArray` in Visual Basic and `params` in C#, are used as wrappers for the <xref:System.ParamArrayAttribute> class.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，個別語言關鍵字，例如`ParamArray`在 Visual Basic 和`params`在 C# 中，可用做為包裝函式<xref:System.ParamArrayAttribute>類別。

trans-unit.source: Some languages, such as C#, may even require the use of the language keyword and prohibit the use of <xref:System.ParamArrayAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: 某些語言，例如 C# 中，甚至可能需要使用的語言關鍵字和禁止使用<xref:System.ParamArrayAttribute>。

trans-unit.source: During overload resolution, when compilers that support parameter arrays encounter a method overload that does not exist but has one fewer parameter than an overload that includes a parameter array, they will replace the method with the overload that includes the parameter array.
trans-unit.target: 多載解析期間支援參數陣列的編譯器中遇到不存在，但有一個較少的參數，與包含的參數陣列的多載的方法多載時也將會取代方法包含的多載參數陣列。

trans-unit.source: For example, a call to the `String.Split()` instance method (which does not exist in the <xref:System.String> class) is resolved as a call to the <xref:System.String.Split%28System.Char%5B%5D%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要呼叫`String.Split()`執行個體方法 (其不存在於<xref:System.String>類別) 會解析成呼叫<xref:System.String.Split%28System.Char%5B%5D%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The compiler will also pass an empty array of the required type to the method.
trans-unit.target: 編譯器也會傳遞至方法的所需的類型的空陣列。

trans-unit.source: This means that the method must always be prepared to handle an array whose length is zero when it processes the elements in the parameter array.
trans-unit.target: 這表示此方法必須永遠準備好處理處理參數陣列中的項目時，其長度為零的陣列。

trans-unit.source: The example provides an illustration.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例將提供說明。

trans-unit.source: For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需屬性用法的詳細資訊，請參閱[屬性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example defines a `Temperature` class that includes a `Display` method, which is intended to display one or more formatted temperature values.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會定義`Temperature`類別，其中包含`Display`方法，用於顯示一個或多個格式化的溫度值。

trans-unit.source: The method has a single parameter, `formats`, which is defined as a parameter array.
trans-unit.target: 方法具有單一參數， `formats`，其定義為參數陣列。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates three different calls to the `Temperature.Display` method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例說明三種不同的呼叫來`Temperature.Display`方法。

trans-unit.source: In the first, the method is passed an array of format strings.
trans-unit.target: 首先，方法被傳遞格式字串的陣列。

trans-unit.source: In the second, the method is passed four individual format strings as arguments.
trans-unit.target: 在第二個方法傳遞四個個別格式字串做為引數。

trans-unit.source: In the third, the method is called with no arguments.
trans-unit.target: 在第三，方法被呼叫沒有引數。

trans-unit.source: As the output from the example illustrates, the Visual Basic and C# compilers translate this into a call to the `Display` method with an empty string array.
trans-unit.target: 範例輸出所示，在 Visual Basic 和 C# 編譯器就會將這翻譯成呼叫`Display`具有空白的字串陣列的方法。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ParamArrayAttribute" /> class with default properties.
trans-unit.target: 使用預設屬性，初始化 <see cref="T:System.ParamArrayAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體。
